name: Wisteria Formations
overview:
Wisteria is a firm of Chartered Accountants and advisers based in London that specialise in supporting early stage companies. The online Wisteria Formations service provides a 10-step company incorporation programme for a flat fee of Â£24.99. An animated guide talks users through every stage of the formation process and at the end of the 10 steps, the user will have a fully-incorporated and legally sound company with all relevant documentation (such as Electronic Memorandum & Articles of Association and Electronic certificate of incorporation).

In addition to assisting with company formations, Wisteria Formations also deals with business plans, preparation of statutory accounts, tax advice, company secretarial services, business accountancy and VAT registration.
